text.text_translated:
Two men looked at the north part of the land.
The land was very big and they could not see the end.
The fences were very far away.
A teenage boy could get bored and not follow rules here.
But it was not possible to get away on foot.
Sam looked at the biggest horse.
It was kicking the ground with its heavy feet.
Sam thought, 'Can the boy ride a horse?'
A good rider could get into trouble here.
The place was far from other people.
But there was a bigger problem for a boy who cannot ride.
This was true if he wanted to get away from his father.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Two men looked at the land.
They looked at the north part of the land.
The land was very big.
They could not see the end of it.
The fences were very far away and hard to see.
A teenage boy can get bored and not follow rules.
But it was not possible to escape this place on foot.
Sam looked at the biggest horse.
It was kicking the ground with its heavy feet.
Sam thought about the boy.
Could he ride a horse?
A good rider could get into a lot of trouble here.
This place was far away from other people.
But maybe there was more trouble for a boy who could not ride.
This was a bigger problem if he wanted to get away from his father.
